name: @threegis/core-wasm
description: WebAssembly core implementation for threegis geometry processing

scripts.build: RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+bulk-memory" wasm-pack build --target web --release --out-dir pkg
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --ext rs --exec "RUSTFLAGS=\"-C target-feature=+bulk-memory\" wasm-pack build --release --target web --out-dir pkg"
